NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION.description: If you are building and committing the clientside app locally, then this will speed up deploys.

KAFKA_URL.description: The url of the Kafka instance of the demo app.

KAFKA_PREFIX.description: The prefix of the Kafka instance of the demo app.

KAFKA_CLIENT_CERT.description: The client certificate of the Kafka instance of the demo app.

KAFKA_CLIENT_CERT_KEY.description: The client certificate key of the Kafka instance of the demo app.
